sentences.english: Resources of medicinal plants in the Chishui Alsophila Natural Reserve.
sentences.chinese: 赤水桫欏自然保護區藥用植物資源。

sentences.english: Yili area is one of the most abundant protected area in Xinjiang province.
sentences.chinese: 伊犁地區是新疆自然保護區數量最多的地區。

sentences.english: Jiuzhaigou Valley is a nature reserve located in China's Sichuan province.
sentences.chinese: 九寨溝是位於中國四川省的自然保護區。

sentences.english: There are 265 national-level nature conservation zones, according to the Ministry of Environmental Protection.
sentences.chinese: 據環境保護部，中國有265個國家級自然保護區。

sentences.english: Visit the Mai Po Nature Conservation Area with your teachers or parents.
sentences.chinese: 和你的教師或父母一起參觀米埔自然保護區。

sentences.english: A preliminary study of the seed plants in the Yezhong Francois Leaf Monkey Natural Reserve.
sentences.chinese: 六盤水野鍾黑葉猴自然保護區種子植物初步調查。

sentences.english: Thus natural preservation for wild rice should be established.
sentences.chinese: 而促進栽培稻的發展，必須建立野生稻自然保護區。

sentences.english: This paper deals with the fern medicine resources of Ailaoshan Mountain national nature reserve.
sentences.chinese: 報道哀牢山國家級自然保護區藥用蕨類植物資源。

sentences.english: Pteridophytes in the Chishui Alsophila Natural Reserve.
sentences.chinese: 赤水桫欏自然保護區蕨類植物。

sentences.english: Zhalong is a nature reserve in Heilongjiang in north-east China.
sentences.chinese: 扎龍是中國東北部黑龍江的一個自然保護區。

sentences.english: We can’t overbuild  a natural environment area.
sentences.chinese: 我們不能在自然保護區內建造過多的房屋。

sentences.english: Studies on the freshwater fishes of Maoer mountain nature reserve;
sentences.chinese: 貓兒山自然保護區位於廣西壯族自治區東北部。

sentences.english: Castanopsis eyrei forest was one of the main forest types in Gutianshan Nature Reserve.
sentences.chinese: 甜櫧林是古田山自然保護區常綠闊葉林主要類型之一。

sentences.english: The Sungshan forest tourist area is the northern region only state-level nature protection area.
sentences.chinese: 松山森林旅遊區是華北地區唯一的國家級自然保護區。

sentences.english: Establish ing nature reserves is the most effective method for the in- site conservation of wild plants and animals.
sentences.chinese: 建立自然保護區是就地保護野生動植物的最有效措施。

sentences.english: Liziba village lies in Baishuijiang National Nature Reserve.
sentences.chinese: 李子壩村地處白水江國家級自然保護區內。
